svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 4 2023
November 4 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 4, 2023" date: "2023-11-03"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Agreed to Deneb simplification (blob sidecar inclusion
proof), ~3 weeks to implement, delays next devnet but gives safer mainnet Devnet 11 launched
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Agreed to Deneb simplification (blob sidecar inclusion proof), ~3 weeks to implement, delays next devnet but gives safer mainnet
Agreed to Deneb simplification (blob sidecar inclusion proof), ~3 weeks to implement, delays next devnet but gives safer mainnet
â€¢ Devnet 11 launched
Devnet 11 launched
â€¢ Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.4 : adds blob sidecar inclusion proof
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.4 : adds blob sidecar inclusion proof
â€¢ Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.34% continues to reduce but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.34% continues to reduce but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU

token contract interface ERC7552 : Decentralized embedding registry

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Hardhat: Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text) Guide to deploying a contract with Hardhat Ignition
Hardhat:
â€¢ Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text)
Hardhat v2.19.0 : adds configuration variables (stored in plain text)

Guide to deploying a contract with Hardhat Ignition

Gaslite Splitter : gas optimized contract for splitting ERC20 & ETH payments
â€¢ Solid-grinder : reduce L2 gas cost by encoding calldata, front end snippets & CLI
Solid-grinder : reduce L2 gas cost by encoding calldata, front end snippets & CLI
â€¢ Reinforced-Concrete-Huff : hash function for bn254 curve, ported to Huff
Reinforced-Concrete-Huff : hash function for bn254 curve, ported to Huff
â€¢ Fe (language) v0.26.0 : option to produce runtime bytecode and verify onchain contracts against local source code
Fe (language) v0.26.0 : option to produce runtime bytecode and verify onchain contracts against local source code
â€¢ Addreth : React component to display ETH addresses
Addreth : React component to display ETH addresses
â€¢ Web3py-discord-bot : example repo using web3.py websocket provider

Security
â€¢ Onyx protocol (Compound v2 fork) $2.1M exploit via precision loss vulnerability
Onyx protocol (Compound v2 fork) $2.1M exploit via precision loss vulnerability

Unibot router $600k exploit via suspected lack of input validation allowing arbitrary call

this week

450 ETH net issuance this week

ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)

real time.
